es.usc.citius.lab.joctomap.util

Class CollisionChecker2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.usc.citius.lab.joctomap.util.CollisionChecker2D

  • public class CollisionChecker2D
extends Object
    This class implements a collision checker which uses native methods to determine the collision in a 2D octree using 2D shapes (circular and rectangular).
    Author:
    Adrián González Sieira <adrian.gonzalez@usc.es>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionChecker2D() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean collides(JOctree octree, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point pose, float radius)
      Checks if there is a collision given an octree and a curren pose, considering a circular shape of the robot centered in the pose given as parameter.
      static boolean collides(JOctree octree, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Pose pose, float dx, float dy)
      Checks if there is a collision given an octree and a curren pose, considering a rectangular shape, defined by a distance in x and y from the robot center of rotation, which is centered in the pose given as parameter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollisionChecker2D

        public CollisionChecker2D()

    • Method Detail

      • collides

        public static boolean collides(JOctree octree,
                               es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point pose,
                               float radius)
        Checks if there is a collision given an octree and a curren pose, considering a circular shape of the robot centered in the pose given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        octree - instance of octree
        pose - pose where the shape is rotated
        radius - radius of the circular shape
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision with the obstacles in the map

      • collides

        public static boolean collides(JOctree octree,
                               es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Pose pose,
                               float dx,
                               float dy)
        Checks if there is a collision given an octree and a curren pose, considering a rectangular shape, defined by a distance in x and y from the robot center of rotation, which is centered in the pose given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        octree - instance of octree
        pose - pose where the shape is rotated
        dx - distance in x from the rotation center to the borders
        dy - distance in y from the rotation center to the borders
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision with the obstacles in the map
